description: High-level system architecture, key components, and business domain overview of the construction pipeline management system

Detailed documentation of the pipeline stage progression model, including stage definitions, transition rules, and validation requirements across Opportunity, Preconstruction, Execution, and Closeout phases
Implementation details of core analytical algorithms including win rate calculations, what-if analysis engine, capacity utilization modeling, and pipeline velocity calculations
Comprehensive documentation of the metrics calculation system, including KPI formulas, weighted pipeline values, financial projections, and stage-specific performance metrics
Documentation of data flow between pipeline components, including real-time updates, state management, and component interaction patterns
